+package org.openjdk.jcstress;
+
+public class Verbosity {
+
+    private final int level;
+
+    public Verbosity(int level) {
+        this.level = level;
+    }
+
+    public boolean printAllTests() {
+        return level >= 1;
+    }
+
+    public boolean printAssembly() {
+        return level >= 2;
+    }
+
+}
